sn4.5:3.1: 5. Dutiyamārapāsasutta
sn4.5:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṃ viharati isipatane migadāye.
sn4.5:5.1: * “Muttāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbapāsehi ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
sn4.5:5.2: Tumhepi, bhikkhave, muttā sabbapāsehi ye dibbā ye ca mānusā.
sn4.5:5.3: Caratha, bhikkhave, cārikaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
sn4.5:5.5: Desetha, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetha.
sn4.5:5.6: Santi sattā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti.
sn4.5:5.8: Ahampi, bhikkhave, yena uruvelā senānigamo tenupasaṅkamissāmi dhammadesanāyā”ti.
sn4.5:5.9: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
